MyOs  0.0.0
MyOs based on Contiki-Os concepts for memory constrained microcontrollers.

33 myos_stats_t myos_stats;

35 PROCESS(idle_process,idle_process);
36 PROCESS_THREAD(idle_process)
37 {
38  static timestamp_t start,stop;
39  static rtimer_timestamp_t rtstart,rtstop;
40 
41  PROCESS_BEGIN();
42 
43  start = timestamp_now();
44  rtstart = rtimer_now();
45 
46  while(1)
47  {
48  PROCESS_SUSPEND();
49 
50  rtstop = rtimer_now();
51  stop = timestamp_now();
52 
53 
54  if( TIMESTAMP_DIFF(stop,start) > 1 ) // more than one tick behind ?
55  {
56  myos_stats.errflags.realtime = 1;
57  }
58 
59  rtstart = RTIMER_TIMESTAMP_DIFF(rtstop,rtstart);
60 
61  if ( rtstart > myos_stats.maxlaptime )
62  {
63  myos_stats.maxlaptime = rtstart;
64  }
65 
66  start = stop;
67  rtstart = rtstop;
68  }
69 
70  PROCESS_END();
71 }
72 #endif
73
